price: Y di: "Ha triunfado la Verdad y se ha disipado la falsedad; la falsedad siempre se desvanece".
arabic: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul jāa al-ḥaqu wazahaqa al-bāṭilu inna al-bāṭila kāna zahūqan
